name: Success Empowerment
who_you_serve: Gail serves professionals who have lost confidence and are seeking to achieve personal and professional success.
what_you_do: Gail Meriel is an award-winning global motivational speaker, international best-selling author, and personal development mentor who empowers professionals to regain self-esteem and redefine success.
business_focus: Gail Meriel is an award-winning global motivational speaker, international best-selling author, and personal development mentor who empowers professionals to regain self-esteem and redefine success.
